text: So the capability to push content into the email body and/or use an existing template would be helpful.
I suppose we could store that content in a property on the contact record and then use a template that personalizes using those tokens
Hi folks, having a bit of trouble trying to get the "readOnly" property of a Select component to work - even if set to `{true}`, it allows the input to be changed?
It shouldn't be editable if readOnly is true. Can you send a loom / visual of what you're seeing?
